titleStmt.title: The vnmasking of the politique atheist By I.H. Batcheler of Diuinitie
titleStmt.author: Hull, John, 1569 or 70-1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Read] for Ralph Howell, dwelling in Paules Church-yard neere the great North doore, at the signe of the White Horse,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; tightly bound and pages trimmed affecting text; signature F2 verso-end from the Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge) copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of the original in the Peterborough Cathedral. Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church-yard neere the great North doore, at the signe of the White Horse
